dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 1020 IH: Bringing Aquaculture Indemnities To Speed Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Moore of Alabama introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Agricultural Act of 2014 to include certain farm-raised fish losses under the livestock indemnity payment program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Bringing Aquaculture Indemnities To Speed Act or the BAITS Act.

section.header: Inclusion of certain farm-raised fish losses under livestock indemnity payment program
section.text: Section 1501 of the Agricultural Act of 2014 (7 U.S.C. 9081) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in subparagraph (F), by striking and at the end;
by redesignating subparagraph (G) as subparagraph (H); and
by inserting after subparagraph (F) the following:
for purposes of subsection (b), farm-raised fish; and

paragraph.text: in subsection (b), by adding at the end the following:

The Secretary may only make a payment under this subsection with respect to livestock described in subsection (a)(4)(G) if the loss or reduced sale of such livestock is due to a cause described in subparagraph (A) or (C) of paragraph (1).
